roleset.name: (cause to) become (more) white
roleset.note: WHITEN-V NOTES: Frame file created by Arrick. Verbnet class other_cos-45.4, other members include activate, age, balance, blur,darken, hasten, laminate, magnetize, revive, ripen, sicken,stabilize, sour, tilt, unwind. (from whiten.01-v)

example.name: whiten-v
example.text: [Many of the jade pieces in the pits]-9 were whitened [*]-9, for example, and the edges of the bronzes were curled and warped.
example.arg: [*]-9 -> Many of the jade peices in the pits

roleset.name: of an ethnic background featuring light skin
roleset.note: WHITE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, FrameNet. (from white.02-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: When you look at other western countries like Canada , America , Australia , the vast majority of its immigrants are not whitethese days and are probably heading for a more diverse future , somuch so to the point that these nations will have very differentdemographic look to them in 50 years time .
example.arg: When you look at other western countries like Canada, America, Australia
the vast majority of its immigrants

roleset.name: the color white
roleset.note: WHITE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet, black-j.01. (from white.01-j)

role.descr: thing that is white in color
specific part of arg1, if also mentioned

example.name: both args
example.text: One was black of hair and blue of eyes the other was white of hair and violet of eyes.
